POLY PREP

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

Rating: 4.5 out of 5.

Poly Prep Country Day School is a Brooklyn college-preparatory school, formerly attached to the Brooklyn Collegiate and Polytechnic Institute (now absorbed into the Tandon School of Engineering at New York University). The school developed a reputation for excellence in the STEM subjects in addition to a rigorous full academic programme as one would expect of a leading private school. The school has been co-educational since the 1970s and offers a full range of varsity sports in which it competes as a member of the Ivy Preparatory School League.
